description: A rustic vegan pasta dish with wine-braised leeks, wild mushrooms, and crumbled Smoked Apple Sage sausage
keywords: vegan pasta, Wild Mushroom Fettucini, Wild Mushroom Fettucini Wild Mushroom Fettucini Wild Mushroom Fettucini with Smoked Apple Sage Field Roast Sausage
name: Wild Mushroom Fettucini with Smoked Apple Sage Field Roast Sausage
recipeIngredient: 2 Smoked Apple Sage Field Roast sausages (crumbled)
8 oz. whole wheat fettucini (cooked according to package)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add leeks and 1/4 c. wine. Cover and cook 7-8 minutes.
Add mushrooms and remaining wine. Cook about 8 minutes more, stirring frequently, until mushrooms are just beginning to brown. Add crumbled sausage to pan and cook 2-3 more minutes.
Add fettucini to pan and toss. Season with salt and pepper.
